findings.title: Accommodation Of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The transfer function does not comply with ERC20 standard as it does not revert transaction when balance is insufficient and may cause issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Improved validRequirement() Modifier in BridgeAdmin
findings.description: The `validRequirement()` modifier in the `BridgeAdmin` contract has a redundant requirement of `ownerCount > 0` that can be improved.

findings.title: Suggested Adherence of Checks-Effects-Interactions
findings.description: The adherence of checks-effects-interactions principle is effective in mitigating a serious attack vector known as re-entrancy.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `BridgeAdmin` contract, there is a privileged `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the contract-wide operations.
